inlineContent.text: DotPalmCore is a part of DotPalm framework group which provides components for palm capture and related functionalities which are easy to integrate into an iOS application.

abstract.text: Indicates how the layer displays video frames.
Presets for the quality attributes thresholds of the palm auto capture result.
Represents the position of a hand when detecting palm.
Stateless class which can detect palm in an image.
Represents the type of placeholder used in palm auto-capture UI.
Configuration of the palm auto capture non-UI component.
Four detected corners in an image.
Class responsible for the initialization of DOT libraries -

Customization options for the palm auto capture user interface.
Class responsible for the localization of user interface strings.
Facing of the camera on the device.
Static class responsible for generating logs. You can configure log level.
Validate minimum template extraction quality of the detected palm.
UI component for capturing palm images using the placeholder.
Raw image with BGR888 pixel format.
Phase of the palm auto capture process.
Configure thresholds for the quality attributes of the palm auto capture result.
The result returned from the processing of one image during the palm auto capture process.
The data sample captured at specific time which serves as an input for the palm auto capture process.
Representation of closed interval with value type
Represents the orientation of a hand when detecting palm.
Raw image with BGRA8888 pixel format.
Non-UI component for the palm auto capture process.
Result of the palm detection process.
Configuration options for the palm auto capture process.
